summary: Are some U.S. schools fraudulently certifying that their foreign students are currently enrolled and attending classes? We previously reported on fraud in the Student and Exchange Visitor Program such as "sham" schools that help students get visas to live in the U.S. without requiring that they attend classes. In some cases these "sham" schools have included major fraud schemes involving hundreds of students. This could...
title: Student and Exchange Visitor Program: DHS Can Take Additional Steps to Manage Fraud Risks Related to School Recertification and Program Oversight
